data.message:
I don’t think he realized who the majority of his fan base was until NOW. Undermining and underestimating the majority of people who put him where he is. He’ll feel it in his pocketbook, I promise. Yea, I’m just some girl from Arkansas, but it’s people like me who got you where you are and we can ruin you just as quick as we made you. I am disgusted and thought you were smarter?! You proved you’re an idiot. Adios 👋🏼

Oh...and f*** you too!

replies.message: You really think this is going to affect him? Are you that dense that you think he gives a shit about losing trump supporter fans? I can see that Arkansas education is doing you well.

If you’re stupid enough not to think it is, you’re the uneducated one! I got more education under my belt than you could imagine having. So take you’re ignorant dumbass somewhere else...oh...go get educated!
